thread.title: Brian Johnson
thread.title_full: Florida Law Advisers, P.A. reviewed by Brian Johnson

author: Brian Johnson
title: Brian Johnson
text:
After meeting with Mr. Finley , I had complete confidence in his ability.
He provided me with clear understandable information and guided me through the process . He answered every question and every e-mail .
He even answered questions on the weekend , and never left me waiting for an answer , and didn't leave me feeling stupid .
He's what this country needs more of .
